I'm looking at 2nd hand Nissan X-trail  7 seater. I need a car as I have new born twins  need to send them to infant care school everyday. Have also survey few 7 seater model like Toyota sienta & BMW 216i gran tourer  but both model have almost equal and more depreciation than Nissan X-trail. The downside for Nissan X-trail is have less coe left and smaller 3rd row seat.
